error.unknownError: An unknown error occurred! Please try again later!
error.ratelimit: You're being ratelimited! Please try again in <seconds> seconds!
error.invalidBody: Request body needs to be a json object!
error.playerNotFound: There is no such player in our records!
error.malformedAuthHeader: You've entered a malformed authorization header!
error.notAllowed: You're not allowed to perform that request!
error.database: The database is not connected. Please try again later!
error.playerNoTag: This player does not have a tag!
error.wrongType: Field "<field>" needs to be of type <type>!

setTag.empty: The tag must not be empty!

success.admin: The player's tag was successfully updated!

setTag.blacklisted: You're not allowed to include "<word>" in your Global Tag!

referral.alreadyReferred: You have already referred a player!
referral.success: You have successfully referred the player!

banned.description: Your account has been banned from GlobalTags for the following reason:
banned.subject: Your GlobalTags account was banned
banned.title: Account Banned
banned.appeal: You can appeal your ban ingame.

verification.subject: Verify your GlobalTags email address
verification.note: If you did not request this, please ignore this email.
verification.title: GlobalTags email verification
verification.description: Please verify your email. You can find the verification code below:

unbanned.subject: Your GlobalTags account was unbanned

tagCleared.warning: Consider this a warning, we won't give you a second chance.
tagCleared.title: Your tag was cleared

tagCleared.description: Your tag [tag] has been cleared from your account.

tagChanged.subject: Your GlobalTag was changed by staff
tagChanged.warning: Depending on what your tag was, you may consider this as a warning.
tagChanged.description: Your GlobalTag was changed by a staff member.
tagChanged.title: Your tag was changed by staff

verified.subject: GlobalTags verification successful
verified.questions: You will now receive any important account updates. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us on our Discord.
verified.success: Your email was successfully verified! We're excited to have you on board!
verified.title: Welcome to GlobalTags!

success.admin: The player's tag position was successfully set!
success.self: Your tag position was successfully set!

position.samePosition: Your tag is already in this position!

unwatch.notWatched: This player is not on the watchlist!
unwatch.success: The player is no longer on the watchlist!

email.invalidEmail: The "email" field needs to be a valid email address!
email.verificationSent: A verification email was sent to you. Please also check the spam folder!
email.notConnected: You don't have an email address linked. Use '/gt link email' to link an account!
email.alreadyConnected: You already have an email address linked. Please use '/gt unlink email' to unlink!
email.unlinked: The email address was successfully removed!

discord.alreadyConnected: You already have a Discord account linked. Please use '/gt unlink discord' to unlink!
discord.notConnected: You don't have a Discord account linked. Use '/gt link discord' to link an account!
discord.unlinked: The discord account was successfully unlinked!

report.invalidReason: You have to provide a valid reason!
report.alreadyReported: You've already reported this player's tag!

appeal.success: The ban appeal was successfully sent!
appeal.alreadyAppealed: You've already sent a ban appeal!

success.admin: The player's tag was successfully reset!

icon.notAllowed: You're not allowed to choose this icon!
